description: Defines a sealed class 'KeyboardKey' that models keys for an on-screen keyboard, including character keys and text/action keys, with associated data classes and an enum for actions.

classes.name: KeyboardKey
classes.description: Sealed class representing different types of keyboard keys, including character keys and text/action keys.

classes.name: KeyboardKey.CharKey
classes.description: Data class for character keys, stores a single character.

classes.name: KeyboardKey.TextKey
classes.description: Data class for text/action keys, includes a label and an associated action.

classes.name: KeyboardKey.Action
classes.description: Enum defining possible actions triggered by certain keys, such as SPACE, BACKSPACE, CLEAR, and DONE.
